channel.title: In my slayer tower i have a monster called dark beast how i make it so you need
channel.description:
ive recently made max stat = 99
in my slayer tower i have an monster dark beasts npc id: 2783 but u cant att cos i made max stat 99 and u need lvl 100 att how i make it lvl 99 to be able att?

item.title: In my slayer tower i have a monster called dark beast how i make it so you need
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Look for the message it sends you when you try to attack with insufficient stats in client.java and change the if statement above it.

Read full topic
